content.text: On August 7, 2025, the elizaOS/eliza repository showed significant activity with 7 new pull requests (of which 3 were merged), 5 new issues opened, and 8 active contributors participating in the project.
PR #5736 titled 'Fix action chaining' by @alex-nax is open.
PR #5728 titled 'feat: ability to cancel current run before any calls to LLM are made' by @alex-nax is open.
PR #5731 titled 'feat: replace numbered versions to workspace:*' by @wtfsayo is merged.
PR #5733 titled 'fix(cli): handle monorepo version in update command' by @wtfsayo is merged.
PR #5729 titled 'Update README.md to fix error' by @mandatedisrael is open.
PR #5732 titled 'feat: remove automatic merge to develop from release workflow' is merged.
Issue #5726 titled 'feat(scenarios): Implement conditional mocking and complex response structures' by @monilpat is OPEN with 2 comments.
Issue #5640 titled 'Ticket Spec: `fix(scenarios): Runtime dependency audit and fix for evaluators`' by @linear is CLOSED after being open for approximately 17 days.
Issue #5639 titled 'Ticket Spec: `fix(scenarios): Fix environment provider integration - bypass issue`' by @linear is CLOSED after being open for approximately 17 days.
Issue #5734 titled 'Eliza CLI failed to build project' by @Kemystra is OPEN with 1 comment.
Issue #5727 titled 'feat(scenarios): Implement natural language agent interaction and response validation' by @monilpat is OPEN with 1 comment.
The repository elizaOS/eliza has a list of top contributors, though specific contributor details are not provided in the input.
